title: New: Hozier – Sedated
content:
Irish dreamboat Hozier is all set to take over the world.

With appearances on Letterman and Ellen within the past couple of weeks, as well as proving one of the must see artists of SXSW, he’s gearing up for a big summer of festivals, and has released new track Sedated as his second official single. Another twist on his own bold, over-the-top brand of pop orientated folk music, his album, expected later in the year, will undoubtedly see him well and truly breaking into the mainstream.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
